product_name: The North Face TNF Apex Bionic Jacket - Boys'
long_description: The North Face Apex Bionic jacket for boys offers great soft-shell performance when it's cold and damp outside. It's well suited for skiing, snowboarding and even hiking when the mercury drops. Offering solid performance, Apex Universal laminated soft-shell fabric with Durable Water Repellent finish is virtually windproof, water-resistant and warm. Features a warm fleece lining for comfort and moisture control. Windflap behind front zipper prevents cold air slipping through; chin guard protects against zipper abrasion. Brushed lining in collar helps hold in warmth. The North Face Apex Bionic jacket features zippered hand pockets and a left chest pocket.
short_description: The North Face Apex Bionic jacket for boys offers great soft-shell performance when it's cold and damp outside. It's well suited for skiing, snowboarding and even hiking when the mercury drops.
